definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable id="gate" type="Boolean">gate</variable></variables><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="-94" y="-37"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="entity_add_potion_advanced"><field name="potion">SLOWNESS</field><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">9</field></block></value><value name="duration"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">10</field></block></value><value name="ambient"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><value name="particles"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><next><block type="move_entity"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="x"><block type="entity_pos_x"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="y"><block type="entity_pos_y"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="z"><block type="entity_pos_z"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">particle minecraft:flame ^0 ^1 ^ 0.1 0.1 0.1 0.05 5 force @a</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
